title: Dream11 Teases Return In Revamped Form After Online Gaming Crackdown
description: After India's new online gaming law which prohibited real-money games, Dream11, the fantasy sports giant has taken to X and teased a new product launch.  This teaser hints at a pivot by Dream11 toward online social games or e-sports, the two forms of gaming p…
content: In August this year, President Droupadi Murmu had issued her assent to the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, which was passed by the Parliament's Upper House earlier. The legislat… [+1141 chars]
